description: Complete Phase 2-6 of Sessions Hub Enhancement: Pre-populate outputs field in session generator, add JSON structure examples and validation checklist to instruction templates, create communication schema for Papertrail validation, update active session instructions, and document validation requirements
goal: Prevent future agent misinterpretation of data structures by improving workflow automation, providing clear examples, and adding automated validation
requirements: Pre-populate outputs field (files_created, files_modified, workorders_created, primary_output) in session generator
Add explicit JSON structure examples to create-session.md instruction template
Add completion verification checklist to instruction template Step 5
Create communication-schema.json for Papertrail MCP validation
Create mcp__papertrail__validate_communication tool for automated validation
Update 3 active scanner-complete-integration agent instructions.json files
Document schema requirements in Sessions Hub resource sheet
Test validation on existing communication.json files
out_of_scope: Retroactive data fixes for git_metrics in existing sessions
Manual file tracking for completed agents
constraints: No breaking changes to existing session API
Maintain backward compatibility with sessions lacking outputs field
Generator changes apply to new sessions only
Communication schema requires Papertrail MCP server update

technical_context.root_cause: Instructions ambiguous - agents misinterpreted data structure requirements, created git_metrics object with counts instead of outputs.files_created[] arrays
technical_context.current_state: Phase 1 complete - agent status extraction fixed, resource sheet index created
technical_context.target_state: Complete workflow improvements preventing future structure misinterpretation through automation, examples, and validation
